Package com.dufuna.berlin.juwonadeyemi.tax.controller

Class TaxBracketController

java.lang.Object
com.dufuna.berlin.juwonadeyemi.tax.controller.TaxBracketController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/api/taxBracket") public class TaxBracketController extends Object
Controller class for managing tax brackets. This class provides RESTful endpoints for calculating taxes, creating, updating, and deleting tax brackets. It is annotated with @RestController to indicate that it handles HTTP requests and returns the response as JSON, and it is mapped to the URL path "/api/taxBracket".

      @Autowired public TaxBracketController(TaxBracketServiceImpl taxBracketServiceImpl)

  • Method Details

    • calculateTax

      @GetMapping("/calculateTax") @ResponseStatus(OK) public double calculateTax(@RequestParam double income)
      Calculates the tax based on the provided income.
      Parameters:
      income - The income for which to calculate the tax.
      Returns:
      The calculated tax amount.

    • createTaxBracket

      @PostMapping("/create") @ResponseStatus(CREATED) public void createTaxBracket(@RequestBody TaxBracket taxBracket)
      Endpoint to create a new tax bracket.
      Parameters:
      taxBracket - The tax bracket to be created, provided in the request body.

    • getTheTaxBracketApi

      @GetMapping @ResponseStatus(OK) public List<TaxBracket> getTheTaxBracketApi()
      Retrieves a list of all tax brackets.
      Returns:
      A list of tax brackets.

    • getTaxBracketById

      @GetMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public TaxBracket getTaxBracketById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Endpoint to retrieve a tax bracket by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the tax bracket to retrieve.
      Returns:
      The tax bracket with the specified ID.

    • updateBracketTaxApi

      @PutMapping("/{id}") @ResponseStatus(OK) public TaxBracket updateBracketTaxApi(@PathVariable Long id, @RequestBody TaxBracket updatedTaxBracket)
      Endpoint to update a tax bracket by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the tax bracket to update.
      updatedTaxBracket - The updated tax bracket information, provided in the request body.
      Returns:
      The updated tax bracket.

    • deleteTaxBracketById

      @DeleteMapping("/{id}") public void deleteTaxBracketById(@PathVariable Long id)
      Endpoint to delete a tax bracket by its unique ID.
      Parameters:
      id - The ID of the tax bracket to delete.
